sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './css/general.css'; class General extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { name: 'John Smith', title: 'Software Engineer', email: 'john.smith@gmail.com', phone: '+39 8473847298', address: 'London, UK', linkedin: 'linkedin.com/in/username' } } render() { const { name, email, phone, address, linkedin, title } = this.state; return (
{title}
{name}
Address
{address}
Email
{email}
Phone number
{phone}
LinkedIn
{linkedin}
) } } export default General
